name: crime investigator subhashree
description:
Join the Tigress Subhasree to solve a series of murder cases in this captivating hidden object, adventure game.
Here we present the very best mystery crime games for you.
Subhasree will require your crime-solving skills to close the case and bring the offenders to justice.
Join the Special Forces of Subhasree and dive into a whole new world of fresh hidden object puzzles, crimes, and exciting criminal case scenes. Use your keen eye and quick wit to solve a new crime. Play through beautiful scenes and challenging puzzles in every episode.
Find Kolkata's one of the best area in this game and we are sure you will love the city of joy.
